page.title: 20A TYPICAL PUPILS WEEKDAY
page.content: 6.45 a.m. Wake up and shower.6.55 a.m. Dress (shorts,T-shirt,trainers) 7.00 a.m. Breakfast(egg on toast) 7.10 a.m. Clean teeth. 7.15 a.m. Make sandwiches 7.30 a.m. Do anything (draw, read, homework) 8.45 a.m. Go to school (Parliament Street County Primary,age range 5 to 11 years) 8.55 a.m. Bell goes,enter classroom. 9.00 a.m. Work while register is called out.9.20 a.m. Go to assembly. 10.00 a.m. Come back and do Maths. 10.25 a.m. Have milk and crisps (potato slices, fried and flavoured) 10.30 a.m. Playtime.10.45 Come in from play, English.12.00 p.m. Have dinner(sandwiches)and then play.1.00 p.m. Do work such as Topic,etc. 3.15 p.m. Go home.3.30 p.m. Play with friends.5.00 p.m. Watch television 5.30 p.m. Play.6.00 p.m. Have dinner 6.30 p.m. Play. 8.30 p.m. Go to bed.
